briefTitle: Flibanserin for the Treatment of Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder in Postmenopausal Women
officialTitle: 24-wk Efficacy and Safety of Flibanserin vs Pbo in Naturally Postmenopausal Women in United States
summary: The objective of this trial is to assess the safety and efficacy of 24-week course of flibanserin for the treatment of Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder (HSDD) in naturally postmenopausal women.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Number of Satisfying Sexual Events
